name: SPX Technologies, Inc.
description: SPX Technologies, Inc. is a diversified, global supplier of engineered solutions and services for the industrial and commercial markets. Established in 1911, the company has built a reputation for innovation and excellence in providing high-quality products and solutions that enhance operational efficiency for its customers. SPX operates through various segments, including HVAC, Detection & Measurement, and Power & Energy, offering a broad range of products such as heat exchangers, valves, thermal systems, and test equipment. The company places a strong emphasis on sustainability and is committed to developing products that reduce energy consumption and environmental impact. SPX Technologies also focuses on research and development to leverage advanced technologies in its product offerings, helping clients navigate the challenges of modern industrial operations. With a presence in over 70 countries, SPX is well-positioned to serve a diverse array of industries, including energy, food and beverage, and industrial manufacturing. The company is dedicated to delivering innovative solutions that drive performance and productivity while maintaining a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction.
